name: Galaxy Shooter (Adam Reed)
description:
This is a 2.5D Space Shooter Game that I developed for my portfolio in collaboration with GameDevHQ!

This game is meant to show off my skills as a developer as well as a programmer. It includes features that use Special Effects, AI, Animation, Score Systems, Powerups, Boss Battles, and lots more!

Check it out and see for yourself! I bet you can't make it to the Boss!
